    • Projects showcase

    Showcase-worthy projects starting from year 2021

    • dotaConfigs - Java project - 2023 - Link

      Everything that creates and uses Dota2 Configurations files. Get weekly-update hero grids with information like pickrates, winrates, etc. directly in your game client.

    • Vib-Ribbon - 3D Art - 2023 - Link

      One of the first 3D arts that were made with BlockBench.

    • Spiky Situation - Game - 2022 - Link

      Hypercasual game where you play as bird and should tap the screen to dodge spikes. It was made at 3AM in 2.5 hours.

    • Rocket Dodger - Game - 2021 - Link

      Arcade game where you dodge rockets and score points for every exploded one.

    • Jumpy Adventure - Game - 2021 - Link

      Platformer where you should reach the top of the Laboratory. Very hard game that even I couldn't complete.

    By msun_ with power of Jekyll. 2023.
